name: Cockpit
description: Cockpit 是一个基于 Web 的图形界面,用于管理 Linux 服务器。它允许用户直接通过 Web 浏览器执行配置网络、管理存储和监控系统性能等任务。它与现有系统工具集成,适合初学者和有经验的管理员。

notes.text: Set a root password if using autologin. This will be the Cockpit password. To set root password run `sudo passwd root`
If you plan on using 45Drives extension with NFS, you must setup LXC as privileged. Some features of 45Drives don't work on Debian 13, so Debian 12 must be used.
